newsitem.title: MOZAMBIQUE: Mozambique police seize 12 tonnes of hashish.
newsitem.headline: Mozambique police seize 12 tonnes of hashish.

text.p: Ten people have been arrested for smuggling almost 12 tonnes of hashish seized on the coast of northern Mozambique this month, police said on Saturday.

A police spokesman in the northern town of Pemba said it was believed the drug was conveyed from a large vessel to a smaller boat, which then sent it on by sailboats to the coast in an operation which took a week.
